title: 25 matches of chat restriction? wtf riot, this doesn't do anything
body: I was waiting in the fountain and caused my "team" to lose. Don't get me wrong, they fully deserved it. All of them. However, i should be punished. Riot, how do you expect to get rid of toxicity and unsportsmanlike behaviour when you give punishments like "25 matches of chat restiriction". At least give me and other like me a permaban. Wtf. Chat restriction doesn't work as a punishment for that person. It punishes people who play with him tho, coz their chances of winning are lower. Get rid of this shit.
